translation.value: [%person#1-surname] to begin planning for next season with board[COMMENT: AREA: Press Conference Questions; SUB-AREA: Board and Consortium Ownership; FR-BN: 25624; TONE: Formal; CHARLIMIT: None; REF-ID: n/a; NOTE: alternative answer string, ANID_CHANGE_REFERENCE_FROM_JOB_VARIABLE_TO_BOARD_OWNERSHIP]

[%person#1-I] will sit down with the board and some of [%person#1-my] staff in the coming days and we'll plan a strategy ahead of next season. [%person#1-I]'m keen to get started[COMMENT: AREA: Press Conference Questions; SUB-AREA: Board and Consortium Ownership; FR-BN: 25624; TONE: Formal; CHARLIMIT: None; REF-ID: n/a; NOTE: alternative answer string, ANID_CHANGE_REFERENCE_FROM_JOB_VARIABLE_TO_BOARD_OWNERSHIP]
